question: ITax - KRA Individual Domestic Context
answer: iTax - KRA Individual Domestic Context. Access Kenya Revenue Authority services using your eCitizen account.

question: Home Page
answer: Using your preferred browser, enter this url: ecitizen.kra.go.ke/ The link opens into the Kenya Revenue Authority online services page. Here, you can: View a brief about KRA View the available services.

question: Sign In
answer: Once you Sign In, enter your credentials either email address or ID number and password.

question:
After signing in via e-citizen, you can view the dashboard. 

If you have a registered PIN proceed. In case you don’t have a PIN, the system displays Register for KRA PIN.
answer: No description available

question: The system directs you to the dashboard where you view Identity Documents, Organizations, Transport, Taxes, Real Estate, Law & Order, Education, Family & Children, Health and Work & Retirement.
answer: No description available

question: This is an overview of the tax information of the user with a KRA PIN.
answer: No description available

question: Accounts Switcher
answer: If you have more than one account, you can view them all here; both Personal and Organisation accounts.

question: Register for a Pin
answer: The system will prompt you to Register PIN in case you don’t have one.

question: Register for a Pin
answer: During the registration process a form is displayed which entails your personal details such as Id Number, Gender, Date of Issue, Date of Birth, Serial Number, Place of Issue, Email Address and Phone Number.

question: Register for a Pin
answer: This section entails basic information: Obligation Details, Source of Income Details and Preview.

question: Register for a Pin
answer: The basic information section entails your personal information which are; Email Address, Physical Address, Postal Address and any additional information.

question: Additional Information
answer: In this section the system displays declaration that you would either select yes or no incase of any information. This includes declaration of bank accounts and trustee entity the user is involved in.

question: Additional Information
answer: When you click yes in declaring your bank account the system displays a form which you will fill in.

question: Additional Information
answer: When you click yes in declaring your Trustee Entity the system displays a form which you will fill in. It entails business name of trust, Pin and the Business Registration Certificate Number.

question: Add Trust
answer: Once the trustee entity information is filled in, the system displays the Trust entity and prompts you to confirm by clicking or cancel incase wrong.

question: Add Tributary Bonds
answer: In this section the system displays an entry for the pin and taxpayer’s name.

question: Add Tributary Bonds
answer: After keying in the pin and taxpayer’s name the system prompts you to select the type of bond and click on add.

question: Basic Information
answer: After completion, the system displays a filled basic information form alongside a Cancel and Next button at the right bottom of the page.

question: Basic Information
answer: Once the Cancel button is clicked the system displays a confirmation message alongside the Back button and Yes button.

question: Obligation Details
answer: In this section select a tax obligation which could be; Income Tax Resident, Income Tax Paye, Turnover Tax, Digital Service Tax and Value Added Tax.

question: Obligation Details
answer: When you select income tax paye, they are obliged to fill in the Registration Date, Number of Employees and estimated monthly paye.

question: Obligation Details
answer: Upon selection of the turnover tax, you are required to fill in the turnover year, estimated turnover next year and click save and next button.

question: Source of Income Details
answer: After completion, the system prompts you to select the source of income whether Employment Income, Business Income, Rental Income or Add Details.

question: Source of Income Details
answer: Once you select any of the source of income, you are required to add details depending on the chosen source of income.. Employment Income Details. Once you select employment as the source of income, you are required to add employer’s pin and employer’s name.

question: Business Income Details
answer: Rental Income Details. Once you select rental as the source of income you are required to select section, give a description, select group and select type.

question: Business Income Details
answer: Upon adding the Business Registration Number, the system displays the Business and prompts you to select the section, give description, select group and select type.

question: Source of Income Details
answer: Upon completion, the system displays a preview of the filled and chosen source of income details with a next button at the right bottom.

question: Once the next button is clicked the system displays a preview the registration pin process for you to certify and submit.
answer: No description available

question: Pin Certificate
answer: Upon submission of the registration pin process the system displays a pin certificate with a message stating you have successfully registered for a pin. Alongside a proceed to profile button at the top right of the page.
